Package edu.pdx.cs410J

Class InvokeMainTestCase

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.pdx.cs410J.InvokeMainTestCase
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    MovieDatabaseRmiTestCase
    public abstract class InvokeMainTestCase
extends Object
    The superclass of test classes that invoke a main method to test a Java program.
    Since:
    Summer 2010
    Author:
    David Whitlock

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      protected class  InvokeMainTestCase.MainMethodResult
      Invokes the main method of a class and captures information about the invocation such as the data written to standard out and standard error and the exit code.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      InvokeMainTestCase()  

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      protected InvokeMainTestCase.MainMethodResult invokeMain​(Class mainClass, String... args)
      Invokes the main method of the given class with the given arguments and returns an object that represents the result of invoking that method.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • InvokeMainTestCase

    • Method Detail

      • invokeMain

        protected InvokeMainTestCase.MainMethodResult invokeMain​(Class mainClass,
                                                         String... args)
        Invokes the main method of the given class with the given arguments and returns an object that represents the result of invoking that method.
        Parameters:
        mainClass - The class whose main method is invoked
        args - The arguments passed to the main method
        Returns:
        The result of the method invocation
